programme.title: The Return of Eliot Ness
programme.desc: Detective Eliot Ness helps avenge his former partner's murder by investigating the case that he was working on when he was killed, which involves one of Al Capone's associates.

programme.title: Martial Outlaw
programme.desc: DEA agent Kevin White has followed a drug-dealing ex-KGB kingpin from Moscow to Los Angeles. There, Kevin crosses paths with his brother Jack, an LAPD cop who wants in on the action--from both sides.

programme.title: The Devil's Three
programme.desc: An underworld kingpin's daughter is kidnapped by his own men. To save her, he calls in karate queen Cleopatra Wong, along with her teammates: a 300-pound psychic and a female impersonator.

programme.title: Alien Abduction: Intimate Secret
programme.desc: Five young women meet at a public pool, where they begin relaying sexual fetish and fantasy stories. Eventually, the inexplicable connections between their stories seem too great to be coincidental.

programme.title: Decoy
programme.desc: Casey meets her rookie cop friend at the boardwalk to console her after she is shaken from her first professional arrest. To calm her nerves, Casey recalls her own first arrest.

programme.title: Mr. Lucky
programme.desc: In a surprising move, Mr. Lucky transforms the Fortuna II into a luxurious dinner club and aids one of its new patrons who is being blackmailed. Herbert Rudley (The Mothers-In-Law) guest stars.

programme.title: Harts of the West
programme.desc: The Harts eagerly await the delivery of their things from Chicago. Meanwhile, a champion rodeo clown whom Dave hired to help break wild mustangs winds up charming Alison and the kids instead.

programme.title: Peter Gunn
programme.desc: A teacher working after school hours finds a student dead in the gym locker room. When he is presumed to be a murderer by the public, he becomes worried about his life, and contacts Peter Gunn.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: When Nick's old P.I. colleague is found dead, he gets the dead colleague's strange case that involves a wealthy property developer. Meanwhile. Nick thinks Sylvie might be pregnant.

programme.title: Spike Team
programme.desc: Luther and his mysterious partner continue their plan by teaching another Virtue. Back on the court, the Spike Team needs a setter. With the pressure rising, Lucky helps the girls keep calm.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: To escape a forced marriage to Walter, Brenda runs away from home. Having proved herself a gallant archer by saving Robin's life, in return she asks a favor: she wishes to become Robin's wife.

programme.title: The Buccaneers
programme.desc: A series of attacks are blamed on Captain Dan Tempest and the Sultana crew. Lieutenant Beamish refuses to believe the situation until he sees Tempest's actions with his own eyes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sir Lancelot
programme.desc: When a king breaks a treaty between his country and an all-female tribe known as the Tribe of Shepherds, the tribe holds the king's daughter hostage. Lancelot must rescue the princess.

programme.title: The Lost World
programme.desc: When Marguerite begins acting uncharacteristically nice, the group raises some questions. A stumbling dinosaur in the jungle holds the answer: an alien life force has begun controlling their bodies.

programme.title: Matt and Jenny
programme.desc: Matt and Jenny meet Cokah, a local Native American boy. It is revealed that Cokah is a white boy who was found alone in the forest years before and has been raised as a Native American.

programme.title: Felix All Around the World
programme.desc: Felix travels all around the world trying to find his way home. Along the way, he meets such wondrous creatures as the Abominable Snowman and the Loch Ness monster.

programme.title: Super Science Showcase
programme.desc: Join Mischief Marie on board the dimensional-hopping Muse as she helps these heroes and more use real science to solve problems in this one-of-a-kind educational film.

programme.title: A Genesis Found
programme.desc: In 1938, John Patton Jr. made an anthropological discovery that shocked the world, but left him shunned. Decades later, his grandson Gardner is forced to come to terms with his grandfather's past.

programme.title: Surviving Camp Analog
programme.desc: After an online prank goes wrong, the Shocklosers--a group of YouTubing high schoolers--are shipped off to Camp Analog: a summer camp designed to rehabilitate destructive tech habits.

programme.title: High School U.S.A.
programme.desc: Senior J.J. Manners navigates the cliques and rivalries that high school entails, all while pursuing Beth Franklin, who happens to be the girlfriend of the quarterback and class president.

programme.title: The Whole Wide World
programme.desc: Set in the 1930s, a Texas schoolteacher falls in love with pulp fiction writer Robert H. Howard. The two couldn't be more opposite, sharing almost nothing but their uniquely passionate romance.

programme.title: Cry in the Wild: The Taking of Peggy Ann
programme.desc: The true story of a young woman's abduction by a deranged ex-convict and the race against the clock to save her--leading to the largest manhunt in Pennsylvanian history.
